meanings.definition: A type of chili pepper commonly used in Spanish cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The serrano added a spicy kick to the dish.
meanings.sent2: I love the flavor of serrano peppers in my salsa.
meanings.sent3: The serrano pepper danced on my taste buds with its heat.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like serrano peppers, sharp and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The serrano pepper painted the dish with its fiery hues.

meanings.definition: A type of ham made from the meat of a serrano pig.
meanings.sent1: The serrano was a delicious addition to the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The serrano ham was thinly sliced and full of flavor.
meanings.sent3: The serrano ham winked at me from the plate.
meanings.sent4: His laughter rang out like the slicing of serrano ham.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of serrano ham filled the room with savory notes.

meanings.definition: A type of cheese made from the milk of a serrano goat.
meanings.sent1: The serrano cheese melted beautifully on the toast.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the creamy texture of serrano cheese.
meanings.sent3: The serrano cheese whispered secrets of the pasture.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as serrano cheese.
meanings.sent5: The tangy flavor of serrano cheese lingered on my palate.
